solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public String convert(String s, int nRows) {--newline--        char[] c = s.toCharArray();--newline--        int len = c.length;--newline--        StringBuffer[] sb = new StringBuffer[nRows];--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < sb.length; i++) sb[i] = new StringBuffer();--newline--        --newline--        int i = 0;--newline--        while (i < len) {--newline--            for (int idx = 0; idx < nRows && i < len; idx++) // vertically down--newline--                sb[idx].append(c[i++]);--newline--            for (int idx = nRows-2; idx >= 1 && i < len; idx--) // obliquely up--newline--                sb[idx].append(c[i++]);--newline--        }--newline--        for (int idx = 1; idx < sb.length; idx++)--newline--            sb[0].append(sb[idx]);--newline--        return sb[0].toString();--newline--    }--newline--}
